name: Flutes and Roses Prologue Demo
description:
Seven suitors. One princess. Every choice counts

Flutes and Roses is an adventure-RPG inspired by the greats like UNDERTALE. Play as Buck Barley, the unexpected seventh suitor for the deadly tournament to rescue the princess. Experience a complex story of adventure, violence and mystery. 

Every choice counts - character's fates will be decided by your actions. Kill your opposing suitors or instead befriend them. Choices will make a real impact featuring branching storylines, dialogue and multiple endings.

Unique combat system - dodge, block or jump a myriad of attack variations from a heap of different enemies and bosses. Battle the Tuba Knight himself, or even the Fiendish Dire Sloth!

Diverse characters - meet a range of dangerous and quirky characters, such as the gallant "Prince Charming" Ser Hugh, the rapscallion rogue Robbing Hood and the frog-wizard Greenie! Your choices will change their fates...

Full soundtrack made from the heart - inspired by tracks from Shrek, Narnia, and other fantastic fairytales!

This is the Flutes and Roses Prologue Demo! 

Thanks for downloading! This is the first section of the adventure-RPG Flutes and Roses. Play through the prologue which is roughly 30-40m long. This is a DEMO, meaning bugs and other issues may be present, however all effort has been made to stamp them out. 

Leave your feedback here https://forms.gle/DrB3y4HHJuUS5kww8

And join the discord here! https://discord.gg/a6FUzyD

Good luck on your journey, Ser Knight!

But remember - Not every fairytale has a happy ending...
